dct_title_s: Highway map of United States : ǂb featuring mileage and driving time along main transcontinental highways / ǂc by H.M. Goushá Company [prepared for for Flying A Gasoline and Veedol 10-30].
dct_description_sm: Relief shown by shading and spot heights. "The principal through-routes are shown in red." On recto: listing of: National parks and monuments -- Canadian parks. Verso: Canadian and Mexican tourist regulations and state motor laws. Transcontinental mileage chart on verso. "218-45 N-EE-45" Shows time zones.
